name: Catch me - 100 seconds survival challenge
description:
Are you able to keep alive for 100 seconds in this survival game? I doubt it ! It’s easy to play at first but hard to stay alive for 100 seconds. Pick up the guns to fight against these annoying balls when you are surrounded. Kill to collect coins that help update your items in the store. Challenge your best score or put it on facebook let others to beat it.


Survival games, stay alert and stay alive
Pick up guns to beat back
Every kill collect 1 coin, update your items in the store
Challenge the your friends best score
